event: Living in Pleasant Mountain Gore, Maine
Farming and fiddling in Pleasant Mountain Gore
Private in Boxford West Parish company of foot soldiers
On 25 May, drafted as a private from West Boxford to guard Atlantic seaboard
Painting sleighs and drums, playing drum, teaching drumming and drum painting
7 September - 25 November, private and musician in three Portland militia companies
24 January, copyrighted title of music book, The Martial Musician's Companion
16 August, son Stephen Twombly is born
Trading voyage to Northwest Coast of Hawaii
9 August, son Rufus King is born
Creates camera obscura to facilitate portrait painting
Boring for source of perpetual heat
Invents main features of the aerial locomotive
Invented, manufactured, and sold a revolving almanac
Worked on project of a horse-propelled twin boat
29 June, twin sons Sylvanus Frederick and Francis Augustus born
Built, worked on, and then sold a horse-powered flatboat
Published A Select Collection of Approved, Genuine, Secret and Modern Receipts, For the Preparation and Execution of Various Valuable and Curious Arts
Published four editions of A Select Collection of Valuable and Curious Arts, and Interesting Experiments
Published plans for airship construction in Mechanics' Magazine
Bought interest in the New York Mechanic
Publishing and editing New York Mechanic
Publishes plans for assorted inventions, advertises his general patent agency in American Mechanic
Invented a revolving rifle, sold it to Colonel Colt
Joined militia at the outbreak of the Mexican War
Publishing and editing the Scientific American
Constructed and publicly exhibited a small working model of his airship
Second exhibition of the airship model
Married Emma Tallman Edgar of Roxbury, MA
Patented method of working valves of auxiliary engines for feeding boilers
23 January, petitioned Senate for appropriation to extend experiments in practical aviation
Organized Aerial Navigation Company to promote his airship
Exhibited a twenty-two foot working model of his airship at Carusi's Hall
Patented apparatus for elevating liquids by retained power
Made plans for construction of an improved airship
Invented and sold a cam lever vise
Applied for and received pension as veteran of War of 1812
Manufacturing and selling improved clothes driers

location: Oak Grove Cemetery, West Haven, CT
